title: Syri a la mano
description: Syri a la mano  was a web application designed for the Multimedia office at ICESI University in which you could manage the openings, closings and supports required at ICESI University, designed for employees and monitors who require a more efficient and fast information management. Made in NextJS and NodeJS.

title: E-Shop Televisores
description: It was a final project of the Internet Computing course which allowed the creation of users, purchase of TVs and administration of them. Made in SpringBoot and NextJS with PostgreSQL database.

title: Competitive Programming Network
description: It was a final project of the course Capstone Project 1 which allowed the administration of users, tournaments and registration of students to the different tournaments. Made in NextJS and NodeJS with PostgreSQL database.

title: Picture Uploader (Technical Test)
description: It was a technical test project for the company Menupp, in this test was required a web application that would allow the management of images, allowing upload, delete and view the uploaded images. Made in VueJS, Quasar and Firebase.
